description: This file defines a mock class `Tr181ApiImplMock` for unit testing, using Google Mock library. The mock class provides mock implementations for methods related to TR-181 parameter management, such as getParam, setParam, clearParam, and error string retrieval, that override the virtual functions of `Tr181ApiImpl`. It is intended for use in testing code that interacts with TR-181 parameters.

classes.name: Tr181ApiImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for Tr181ApiImpl used in testing.

methods.name: ~Tr181ApiImplMock
methods.description: Default destructor for the mock class.

methods.name: getParam
methods.description: Mocked method for retrieving a parameter value.

methods.name: setParam
methods.description: Mocked method for setting a parameter value.

methods.name: clearParam
methods.description: Mocked method for clearing a parameter.

methods.name: getTR181ErrorString
methods.description: Mocked method for retrieving error string from error code.

methods.name: getLocalParam
methods.description: Mocked method for retrieving a local parameter.

methods.name: setLocalParam
methods.description: Mocked method for setting a local parameter.

methods.name: clearLocalParam
methods.description: Mocked method for clearing a local parameter.
